articles.title: COVID-19 cases surge around world, raising testing and quarantine fears - Rappler
articles.description: Testing bottlenecks build in European nations, including Spain where demand for free COVID-19 testing kits outstripped supply
articles.content: SYDNEY, Australia Daily COVID-19 infections have hit record highs in the United States, swathes of Europe and Australia as the new Omicron variant of the virus races out of control, keeping workers a… [+3758 chars]

articles.title: Omicron fear grips world as Europe, UK see record Covid cases, US confused over new isolation rules - India Today
articles.description: Even as efforts are on to contain the spread of the Omicron Covid variant, Europe has seen a record rise in Covid cases, while new isolation rules have stirred confusion in the US.
